critique:
The document expresses concern and determination to address the railroad strike and ensure the continuation of essential transportation services. It invokes legal authority and directs government officials to take specific actions. Initial assessment:

*   Joy: 1 (no expression of joy)
*   Sadness: 3 (concern about the disruption caused by the strike)
*   Fear: 4 (fear of the consequences of the strike on national defense and public safety)
*   Disgust: 1 (no expression of disgust)
*   Surprise: 2 (possible surprise at the severity of the strike's impact)
